ComicInfo.Title: Wylder; Hate Crimes
ComicInfo.Summary:
Wylder: Wylder rescues a little girl who has been kidnapped.
Hate Crimes: A trio of bigoted bandmates get stomped by Bloodpool when they show up to beat on the mongrel races who booed them off the stage.
